description.p: EclipseLink is a leader is providing standards based open source persistence solutions. The following downloads are reference implementations delivered by the EclipseLink project.
The EclipseLink JPA component in EclipseLink provides the compatible implementation of Jakarta Persistence 3.1.

li.a: EclipseLink 4.0.2 - Full EclipseLink build, including the Jakarta Persistence 3.1 CI (TCK Summary).

description.p: The EclipseLink JPA component in EclipseLink provides the compatible implementation of Jakarta Persistence 3.0.

li.a: EclipseLink 3.0.3 - Full EclipseLink build, including the Jakarta Persistence 3.0 CI (TCK Summary).

description.p: The EclipseLink JPA component in EclipseLink provides the reference implementation of JPA 2.2.

li.a: EclipseLink 2.7.12 - Full EclipseLink build, including the JPA 2.2 RI/CI (TCK Summary).

description.p: The EclipseLink JPA component in EclipseLink provides the reference implementation of JPA 2.1.

li.a: EclipseLink 2.6.9 - Full EclipseLink build, including the JPA 2.1 RI.
minimal bundles containing the JPA 2.1 RI

description.p: The EclipseLink JPA component in EclipseLink provides the reference implementation of JPA 2.0.

li.a: EclipseLink 2.0.0 - Full EclipseLink build, including the JPA 2.0 RI.
EclipseLink 2.0.0 - minimal bundles that are shipped in the Java EE6 RI.

description.p: The EclipseLink SDO component in EclipseLink 1.1 provides the reference implementation of SDO 2.1.1.

li.a: EclipseLink 1.1.0 - Only the SDO 2.1.1 required components

The EclipseLink Project produced contents to version 2.7.3 (inclusive) are dual licensed under the terms of the Eclipse Public License v1.0 and Eclipse Distribution License v1.0 .
For the license of dependent libraries included within a distribution please refer to the about.html file within each distribution.
